text: Mario Prada was born in the Kingdom of Italy in Milan and later passed away in 1958 in Italy. He was renowned as the founder and original designer of the iconic fashion label Prada. Established in 1913, Prada became synonymous with high fashion, offering a range of luxury goods for both men and women, such as shoes, handbags, luggage, and leather items. Notably, Mario Prada is also the grandfather of Miuccia Prada, who later became a prominent figure in the fashion world herself. title: Mario Prada
